name: Time Jumper (itch)
description:
Time Jumper - Platform through time itself!

Time Jumper, a game inspired by music games like Geometry Dash and platformers like Super Meat Boy, is a mix of both types of games. Platform your way through time in a constantly changing environment!

Planned Upcoming Content:
  • 3 full levels
  • more hazards
  • moving enemies and cannons
  • 3 forms to play as
  • more character customization
Update: Windows version is not out!
